playItems.name: Double EXP
playItems.description: An item that doubles the base EXP gained from one performance.

playItems.name: EXP x3
playItems.description: Receive 1 every day! Must be used that day! An item that triples the base EXP gained from one performance.

playItems.name: Double Points
playItems.description: An item that doubles the points gained from one performance.

playItems.name: Performance Assist
playItems.description: An item that changes 10 BAD hits to OK and lets you perform double taps for large notes with a single tap.

playItems.name: Long-Press Drum Roll
playItems.description: An item that lets you perform a drum roll with a long press.

playItems.name: Rainbow Mallet
playItems.description: An item that changes mallet notes into rainbows, which give you items when successfully hit.

playItems.name: All-In
playItems.description: EXP x5, points x5, 10 Long-Press Drum Roll and Performance Assist.
